Package com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.statemachine.listeners

Interface JobExecutionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleLogListener, LoggingListener, TracingListener
    public interface JobExecutionListener
    Listener of job execution. Notifications are delivered synchronously from the state machine execution thread.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void afterStateActionAttempt​(States state, java.lang.Exception exception)
      Invoked after the action associated with a given state is invoked.
      default void beforeStateActionAttempt​(States state)
      Invoked before the action associated to a given state is invoked.
      default void delayedStateActionRetry​(States state, long retryDelay)
      Invoked when the state machine is about to wait before retrying the action associated to the given state as a result of a retryable exception on the previous attempt.
      default void executionAborted​(States state, FatalJobExecutionException exception)
      Invoked when the state machine encounters a fatal exception in a critical state, which causes the execution to abort.
      default void fatalException​(States state, FatalJobExecutionException exception)
      Invoked when the state machine encounters a fatal exception while invoking the action for a given state.
      default void stateEntered​(States state)
      Invoked when the state machine reaches the next state, before any of the logic for that state is evaluated.
      default void stateExited​(States state)
      Invoked when the state machine is done processing a state and it is about to enter the next one.
      default void stateMachineStarted()
      Invoked when the state machine starts running.
      default void stateMachineStopped()
      Invoked when the state machine stops.
      default void stateSkipped​(States state)
      Invoked when the action of a given state is skipped because execution was aborted and the state is set to be skipped in case of aborted execution.

    • Method Detail

      • stateEntered

        default void stateEntered​(States state)
        Invoked when the state machine reaches the next state, before any of the logic for that state is evaluated.
        Parameters:
        state - the state entered

      • stateExited

        default void stateExited​(States state)
        Invoked when the state machine is done processing a state and it is about to enter the next one.
        Parameters:
        state - the state exiting

      • beforeStateActionAttempt

        default void beforeStateActionAttempt​(States state)
        Invoked before the action associated to a given state is invoked.
        Parameters:
        state - the state whose action is invoked

      • afterStateActionAttempt

        default void afterStateActionAttempt​(States state,
                                     @Nullable
                                     java.lang.Exception exception)
        Invoked after the action associated with a given state is invoked.
        Parameters:
        state - the state whose action was invoked
        exception - the exception thrown by the action, or null if there was no error

      • stateMachineStarted

        default void stateMachineStarted()
        Invoked when the state machine starts running.

      • stateMachineStopped

        default void stateMachineStopped()
        Invoked when the state machine stops.

      • stateSkipped

        default void stateSkipped​(States state)
        Invoked when the action of a given state is skipped because execution was aborted and the state is set to be skipped in case of aborted execution.
        Parameters:
        state - the state whose action is skipped

      • fatalException

        default void fatalException​(States state,
                            FatalJobExecutionException exception)
        Invoked when the state machine encounters a fatal exception while invoking the action for a given state.
        Parameters:
        state - the state whose action produced a fatal exception
        exception - the exception

      • executionAborted

        default void executionAborted​(States state,
                              FatalJobExecutionException exception)
        Invoked when the state machine encounters a fatal exception in a critical state, which causes the execution to abort.
        Parameters:
        state - the state whose action produced a fatal exception
        exception - the exception

      • delayedStateActionRetry

        default void delayedStateActionRetry​(States state,
                                     long retryDelay)
        Invoked when the state machine is about to wait before retrying the action associated to the given state as a result of a retryable exception on the previous attempt.
        Parameters:
        state - the state whose action will be retried after a pause
        retryDelay - the retry delay in milliseconds
